sentences.en: A bare fallow can be used with a herbicide such as glyphosate or amitrole.
sentences.cn: 对荒秃的休耕地可以使用象镇草宁或杀草强一类的混合除草剂.

sentences.en: Accurate separation between forest and forest fallow may not always be possible.
sentences.cn: 对林地和休耕林地的精确划分有时是不大可能的.

sentences.en: After a fallow period, she gave birth to two sons.
sentences.cn: 久未生育之后, 她一连又生了两个儿子.

sentences.en: Alternate strips planted to crops each year serve as windbreaks for the fallow strip.
sentences.cn: 每年播种作物的轮种带可用作休耕带的防风林.

sentences.en: At this very moment there are probably important inventions lying fallow.
sentences.cn: 就在目前这个时刻,说不定还有一些重要的创造发明尚未发挥作用.

sentences.en: Creation of new products would fallow a selection of components already created.
sentences.cn: 新产品的开发将休耕的组件的选择已经创建的.

sentences.en: Farmers are now paid to let their land lie fallow .
sentences.cn: 农民让土地休耕现在得到了回报。

sentences.en: Farmers know that soil needs rest, so they rotate their crops and systematically leave a portion of their land fallow.
sentences.cn: 农夫们知道土地是需要休息的，因此他们轮流种植农作物并系统地留一部分土地休耕。

sentences.en: I eased out of the tree and hurried off across fallow farmland.
sentences.cn: 我小心翼翼地从树窝中出来，急匆匆地穿过尚未耕作的农田。

sentences.en: Leaving some fields fallow provided a natural check on insect populations.
sentences.cn: 让一些土地休耕是自然控制昆虫数量的办法.

sentences.en: Spontaneous fallow vegetation can also be counted as a crop rotation element.
sentences.cn: 自然生长的休耕植被也可以当成一种轮作植物.

sentences.en: Summer fallow is the best method of destroying weeds.
sentences.cn: 夏季休耕是消灭杂草的最好办法.

sentences.en: That factory lies at the end of a straight dirt road through fallow corn fields 10 miles from Gaoling.
sentences.cn: 离高陵10英里，穿过一片休耕的玉米地，在一条笔直的泥泞马路的尽头，即是这家砖厂的所在地。

sentences.en: The farmer kept his cows in a fallow field.
sentences.cn: 那农民把他的奶牛放在休闲地里.

sentences.en: The farmer left the land fallow for a year.
sentences.cn: 这位农民让田地休耕一年.

sentences.en: There followed something of a fallow period professionally, until a job came up in the summer.
sentences.cn: 接着在事业上无甚起色，直到夏季有了一份工作。

sentences.en: They let the land lie fallow for a year.
They take in fresh land in order to fallow the exhausted soil.
sentences.cn: 他们另行耕种新土地,使耗竭的土地得到休闲.

trans.tran_cn: 犁过而未播种的，休闲的，（指耕地）未经耕作的
trans.tran_en: fallow land is dug or  ploughed  but is not used for growing crops
to leave (land) unseeded after ploughing and harrowing it
